ygData.subject: Re: Enchanting Items
ygData.msgSnippet: I just tried to enchant some jewelery and was disapointed. I thought all gems would create some type of magic item when combined with an enchanted bar of
ygData.messageBody:
I just tried to enchant some jewelery and was disapointed. I thought
all gems would create some type of magic item when combined with an
enchanted bar of metal.
I would like to see which gems you have used to create magic items
and the effect produced. Also, the different strenghts afforded to
by the type of metal used in the construction. Even a suggested
retail price.

Sindailye
Xegony Server
